Gear for sale

By Krister Axel on November 22, 2012 in Random

I just moved and need to get rid of some gear. Message me with any questions.

1: 5 reels of Ampex/Quantegy 499 - 2 inch tape - $10 each - SOLD

[caption id="attachment_1004" align="aligncenter" width="300" caption="5 reels of 499 2-inch tape"][/caption]

2: Dr. Z class A tube / guitar amp - $200 - SOLD [caption id="attachment_1005" align="aligncenter" width="300" caption="Dr Z 'boutique' class A tube amp - model 'Carmen Ghia'"][/caption]

3: old Motionsound spinning horn leslie - $100 - SOLD [caption id="attachment_1006" align="aligncenter" width="300" caption="Motionsound KB3 - leslie sim with real AX7 tube preamp and actual spinning horn"][/caption]

4: Nord Modular keyboard (rare) with sweet travel case - $600 - SOLD

[caption id="attachment_1007" align="aligncenter" width="300" caption="Nord modular discontinued keyboard - highly sought after - with custom flight case"][/caption]

5: 20-unit rolling Gator case with Mackie 1402-VLZ3 on top - SOLD

lots of extras: Alesis LX-20 (20 bit) ADAT 8 track recorder; 2 Furman power conditioners with lights; Behringer Ultralink pro; Tapco SG2 compression (2 mono tracks or 1 track stereo); Studio Projects VTB1 mono preamp; shelf and drawer; TC Electric C300 effects unit; all the cords you need to hook it up (it is already wired). The case and the board are brand new (bought in November 2010) with literally no use. The ADAT has about 100 hours on the heads (basically nothing). $800 takes the whole thing. Perfect for a new home studio or a portable set-up in a venue for live tracking to affordable ADAT tapes. [caption id="attachment_1008" align="aligncenter" width="224" caption="The Gator G-Tour PU Pop-up Console Rack Road Case with Mackie 1402-VLZ3 and lots of extras"][/caption]

Everything is in perfect working condition. All prices firm. Cash only and no shipping - you must pick up in West Hollywood. I can send you more pictures if you are interested. I will put this on Craigslist soon if it doesn't go within the next few days.

thanks!
